cause.description:
I have sponsored an impoverished child from Zambia, and my mission is to get people everywhere to do the same. It's not very costly, and the feeling of helping those in need, especially children, is a truly great one to feel.
1. All people should have the right to clean food and water.
cause.mission: Stop poverty and dying around the world
cause.name: Dying children of the world need our help, let's make it happen
